overview: In 2020, Dr. Yi developed a program that re-reads the brain and enhances human skills. The program can read a person’s memory and add any required skills based on it. This program can change the future of human development. But the fly in the ointment, the program will cover the memory of the past… Even if the program is not perfect, it is enough to cause a sensation in the academic world.
title: Escape 2020 Run For The Life
